activities: Ambit is a biopharmaceutical company engaged in the discovery, development and commercialization of drugs to treat human diseases, including oncology, autoimmune and inflammatory diseases.  Ambit is conducting  clinical trials where subjects provide access to personal information including but not limited to: medical history, physical exam, laboratory test data, date of birth, initials, gender, and concomitant medications. Data is collected either in an electronic case report form or paper case report forms. Data is collected in order to evaluate the safety and efficacy of the investigational product under investigation.
contacttitle1: Senior Vice President and General Counsel
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President and General Counsel
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Information including but not limited to medical history, physical exam, laboratory test data, date of birth, initials, gender, and concomitant medication
recoursemech: Ambit will adhere to arbitration by JAMS International.
